verses.text: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* our \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* and \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w present|strong="H4672"\w* \w help|strong="H5833"\w* in \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.\f + \fr 46.1 \ft for: or, of\f*

Therefore will not we \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, though the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* be \w removed|strong="H4171"\w*, and though the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* be \w carried|strong="H4131"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*;\f + \fr 46.2 \ft midst…: Heb. heart of the seas\f*

\add Though\add* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* thereof \w roar|strong="H1993"\w* \add and\add* be \w troubled|strong="H2560"\w*, \add though\add* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w shake|strong="H7493"\w* with the \w swelling|strong="H1346"\w* thereof. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\add There is\add* a \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, the \w streams|strong="H6388"\w* whereof shall make \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \add place\add* of the \w tabernacles|strong="H4908"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of her; she shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w help|strong="H5826"\w* her, \add and that\add* \w right|strong="H6437"\w* \w early|strong="H1242"\w*.\f + \fr 46.5 \ft and…: Heb. when the morning appeareth\f*

The \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* \w raged|strong="H1993"\w*, the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* were \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*: he \w uttered|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w melted|strong="H4127"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* with us; the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \add is\add* our \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 46.7 \ft our…: Heb. an high place for us\f*

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2372"\w* the \w works|strong="H4659"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, what \w desolations|strong="H8047"\w* he hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

He maketh \w wars|strong="H4421"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* unto the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; he \w breaketh|strong="H7665"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, and \w cutteth|strong="H7112"\w* the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* in \w sunder|strong="H7112"\w*; he \w burneth|strong="H8313"\w* the \w chariot|strong="H5699"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

Be \w still|strong="H7503"\w*, and \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I will be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, I will be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* with us; the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \add is\add* our \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
